targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', created_at) as time,
  i.market,
  AVG(br.mape) as avg_mape
FROM pg.backtest_results br
JOIN pg.instrument i ON br.instrument_id = i.instrument_id
WHERE br.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY time, i.market
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', created_at) as time,
  i.product,
  AVG(br.wape) as avg_wape
FROM pg.backtest_results br
JOIN pg.instrument i ON br.instrument_id = i.instrument_id
WHERE br.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY time, i.product
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', created_at) as time,
  i.market,
  br.rmse
FROM pg.backtest_results br
JOIN pg.instrument i ON br.instrument_id = i.instrument_id
WHERE br.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', created_at) as time,
  i.market,
  AVG(br.mean_error) as avg_bias
FROM pg.backtest_results br
JOIN pg.instrument i ON br.instrument_id = i.instrument_id
WHERE br.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY time, i.market
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  (evaluation_end - forecast_date) as horizon_days,
  AVG(mape) as avg_mape,
  AVG(rmse) as avg_rmse
FROM pg.backtest_results
WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY horizon_days
ORDER BY horizon_days

SELECT
  br.instrument_id,
  i.market,
  i.product,
  AVG(br.mape) as avg_mape,
  AVG(br.wape) as avg_wape,
  AVG(br.rmse) as avg_rmse,
  COUNT(*) as backtest_count
FROM pg.backtest_results br
JOIN pg.instrument i ON br.instrument_id = i.instrument_id
WHERE br.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY br.instrument_id, i.market, i.product
ORDER BY avg_mape DESC
LIMIT 10
